## TokenDimension interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface TokenDimension extends Token<TokenType.Dimension, {
    value: number;
    unit: string;
    type: NumberType;
    signCharacter?: '+' | '-';
}> 
```

'+' \| '-'


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The sign character as it appeared in the source. This is only useful if you need to determine if a value was written as "2px" or "+2px".
